About Us

We enable you complete business transactions by delivering mails and packages

Mission

To enable corporates complete business transactions through delivery of mail and packages

Qualities

Fast, Secure and Reliable

Vision

To connect African cities through seamless delivery of packages.

Timeline

Before we started, our founding lawyer worked in the FMCG industry.

At work, there was a constant need to have sensitive documents delivered fast and secure within time-bound systems.

In March 2019, Byke It deliveries was founded.

Who we are

A business that enables people and businesses move packages and run errands in Nairobi without the hassle of traffic, long queues, etc.

Our team

We are a young, vibrant team of 12.

The company is headed by the Managing Director, who is in charge of operations.

Under her, there are: 1 customer service assistant, 1 marketing assistant and 8 riders who work hand in hand to ensure that no delivery is done out of time.

Go further with Byke It Deliveries

We are looking to expand our services to serve more businesses and corporates.

You can contact us on our social media pages or Send us a message.
